app.title: Flipper World Jumping Animation Simulator | Prevent Stroke
app.description: A web page that simulates the animation of the World Flipper. Including random generation, certain 3/4/5 stars, and blood pressure test mode. Prevent stroke, cerebral hemorrhage, and high blood pressure.

message.simulation_record: This result is the {total} simulation of this site

warning_message.this_website_will_not_be_responsible_for: This page is not responsible for all consequences, including and not limited to the following reactions：
warning_message.example: Cerebral hemorrhage, high blood pressure, stroke...
